name: Talon
title: the Blade's Shadow

P.name: Blade's End

effects.description: Innate: Talon's abilities apply a stack of Wound to enemy champions and large monsters each time they are hit. Wound lasts for 6 seconds, refreshing with basic attacks and subsequent hits, and stacks up to 3 times.

Talon's next basic attack against an enemy with 3 Wound stacks is empowered to consume them all to cause the target to bleed, dealing[ 75 ‚àí 245 (based on level) (+ 200% bonus AD) total physical damage over 2 seconds, ][ 4.6875 ‚àí 15.3125 (based on level) (+ 12.5% bonus AD) physical damage every 0.125 seconds over 2 seconds, ]increased to 120% damage against monsters. The target cannot gain stacks during this time.

P.notes:
Blade End's enhanced attack will still trigger if  blocked.
Both passes of  Rake and  Shadow Assault apply a stack of Wound.
 ùêèùêÑùêçùêÉùêàùêçùêÜ ùêÖùêéùêë ùêìùêÑùêíùêì : Interaction with parrying effects ( dodge,  blind).
 Spell shield prevents Wound stacks from being applied.
 Spell shield prevents Blade End's enhanced attack from triggering though still consuming all Wound stacks.
P.blurb: Innate:  Talon's abilities apply stacks of Wound to  champions and large  monsters each time they are hit, stacking up to a cap.

Q.name: Noxian Diplomacy

effects.description: Active: Talon dashes towards the target enemy, dealing physical damage upon arrival. If Noxian Diplomacy is cast within close range, Talon instead stabs the target to critically strike for (50% + 35%) bonus physical damage, as well as gain 75 bonus attack range on his next basic attack within 1 second.
If Noxian Diplomacy kills the target, Talon heals for 9 ‚àí 55 (based on level) and its cooldown is reduced by 50%.
Noxian Diplomacy's stab resets Talon's basic attack timer. Shadow Assault can be cast during the dash.

Q.notes:
Talon will track the target if they change locations.
He will dash to the target's previous location while still dealing damage if the target is too far away or moves beyond 800 units.
Talon will be ordered to basic attack the target at the end of the dash.
While  grounded or  rooted, Noxian Diplomacy can only be cast within stab range.
Noxian Diplomacy will also grant the heal if the target dies upon Talon's completion of the dash.
If the target becomes  untargetable,  dies, or is too far away or no longer in  sight during the cast time, this ability will cancel but does not go on  cooldown nor pay its cost (if applicable).
This only applies to the stab version.
Q.blurb: Active:  Talon  leaps to the target enemy, dealing physical damage. If the target is within melee range, Talon instead  critically strikes the target, dealing bonus physical damage.

W.name: Rake

effects.description: Active: Talon throws a fan of daggers in a cone in the target direction that deals physical damage to enemies hit.
At maximum range, the daggers linger for 0.75 seconds before homing back to Talon, dealing physical damage and slowing enemies hit for 1 second. Enemies can be hit only once per pass.

W.notes:
If Talon dies while Rake is mid-air, the projectiles will still complete their travel.
This ability will cast from wherever the caster is at the end of the cast time.
W.blurb: Active:  Talon throws a fan of daggers in the target direction that deals physical damage to enemies hit.

E.name: Assassin's Path

effects.description: Active: Talon dashes up to 800 units over the target area of terrain, during which he gains unobstructed vision.
Talon cannot cast Assassin's Path on the same area of terrain for a set duration.
Shadow Assault can be cast during the dash.

E.notes:
Assassin's Path can interact with player-generated terrain.
Talon will stop dashing upon entering  stasis but will continue to do so afterwards.
E.blurb: Active:  Talon  vaults over the target terrain.

R.name: Shadow Assault

effects.description: Active: Talon disperses a ring of blades around him that deals physical damage to nearby enemies, and gains invisibility and bonus movement speed for up to 2.5 seconds.
Shadow Assault can be recast after 1 second within the duration, and does so automatically after the duration or if Talon emerges from invisibility.

Recast: Talon ends Shadow Assault, breaking invisibility and converging the blades to him, dealing the same physical damage to enemies hit. Breaking invisibility with a basic attack or Noxian Diplomacy causes the blades to converge to the target instead.

R.notes:
Spell shield will block a single pass.
Shadow Assault does not cancel Talon's basic attacks.
Shadow Assault has a minimum lifetime of 0.8 seconds before convergence.
R.blurb: Active:  Talon disperses a ring of blades around him that deals physical damage to nearby enemies, and gains  invisibility and  bonus movement speed for a short time.

lore: Talon is the knife in the darkness, a merciless killer able to strike without warning and escape before any alarm is raised. He carved out a dangerous reputation on the brutal streets of Noxus, where he was forced to fight, kill, and steal to survive. Adopted by the notorious Du Couteau family, he now plies his deadly trade at the empire's command, assassinating enemy leaders, captains, and heroes‚Ä¶ as well as any Noxian foolish enough to earn the scorn of their masters.

skins.name: Original
skins.lore: Talon is the knife in the darkness, a merciless killer able to strike without warning and escape before any alarm is raised. He carved out a dangerous reputation on the brutal streets of Noxus, where he was forced to fight, kill, and steal to survive. Adopted by the notorious Du Couteau family, he now plies his deadly trade at the empire‚Äôs command, assassinating enemy leaders, captains, and heroes‚Ä¶ as well as any Noxian foolish enough to earn the scorn of their masters.

skins.name: Crimson Elite
skins.lore: The Crimson Elite cannot confirm or deny the existence of the agent known as Talon. The bloody trail left behind him serves as a sinister warning to all. Perhaps more disconcerting are the hundreds of undocumented cases that remain undiscovered.

skins.name: Dragonblade
skins.lore: Legend says that Talon's blades were forged in the fire of a shadow dragon, and that he turned against his corrupt masters, cutting through them one by one before vanishing into the night. Many believe he will appear again whenever the strong take advantage of the weak.

skins.name: SSW
skins.lore: Honoring PawN's winning performance as Talon during the 2014 World Championship.

skins.name: Blood Moon
skins.lore: An anarchic demon summoned on the night of the Blood Moon, Talon was once a human assassin who surrendered his flesh during one of the cult's possession rituals. He now kills indiscriminately, relishing the terror in his victim's dying eyes.

skins.name: Enduring Sword

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive during 2018.

skins.lore: A haughty dragon king of the south seas, Talon accepted a duel from the demigoddess Irelia, only to be defeated in his own throne room. Humiliated, he lashed out at her‚Ä¶ and she sealed his power within her blade, tasking him with finding new purpose in the mortal realm.

skins.name: Talon Blackwood

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.

skins.lore: The sworn brother of Twitch Shadowfoot, dashing assassin extraordinaire Talon Blackwood is one half of an infamous underworld duo and the only advanced class in the entire party. He's also a brooding dark elf antihero with a tragic backstory, who is fated to one day save the world! Probably.

skins.name: Withered Rose

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2021.

skins.lore: After the alliance his adopted sister Katarina formed at the last festival was broken, Talon swore revenge. He intends to restore their family's honor by exposing and shattering the entire concept of this celebration of glittering finery and sacred vows. Nothing and no one at this year's festival will escape his wrath.

skins.name: High Noon

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the MSI 2022 High Noon event.
This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2022.

skins.lore: ‚ÄúFate is catchin' up to you, old friend,‚Äù Talon says, leaning back in his chair, predator's eyes gleaming under the shadows of his hat. He still moves like a demon, even warped and corrupted by angel blood as he is. His smile, rueful and knowing, has too many teeth: ‚ÄúThe end is comin' for us all.‚Äù

skins.name: Prestige High Noon
skins.lore: Devilishly handsome and wearing the latest in Western chic, Talon is equally ready to rock the runway or ride the open road. Those boots are made for walking, and he'll walk all over anyone standing in his way.
